scripts.build: npm run build-core && npm run build-ssg
scripts.publish-core: cd packages/retent && npm run build && npm run publish
scripts.publish-ssg: cd packages/retent-server && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.publish-all: npm run publish-core && npm run publish-ssg && npm run publish-start
scripts.previews: cp README.md packages/retent/README.md && npx pkg-pr-new publish './packages/retent' './packages/retent-server' './packages/retent-start'
